overview: Siri, 15, receives a call from child protection services who have heard that she might be facing problems in her family. A visit is planned at her house on Saturday. Siri has two days to regain control over her life and give the illusion of a healthy and happy family environment. But when the rumor that she sells cannabis starts to circulate, everything races and Siriâ€™s world collapses.
title: The Animal
